name: cond_csvbd1
source:
def cond_csvbd1(x):
    return jnp.where(x > 0.5, jnp.sin(x), jnp.cos(x))
jaxpr:
{ lambda ; a:f32[4]. let
    b:bool[4] = gt a 0.5:f32[]
    c:f32[4] = sin a
    d:f32[4] = cos a
    e:f32[4] = jit[
      name=_where
      jaxpr={ lambda ; b:bool[4] c:f32[4] d:f32[4]. let
          e:f32[4] = select_n b d c
        in (e,) }
    ] b c d
  in (e,) }
